website_summaries.verdict: A unique set of 12-inch subwoofers that makes it easier to place and install in vehicles with minimal set up, cutting, and drilling.
pros: Combines two 1200-watt dual loaded subwoofers in a single, durable box
Comes with a 1500-watt amp that is compatible with most factory-installed and aftermarket stereo systems for easy setup
Can be placed virtually anywhere in the interior with just a few mounting holes
cons: Larger box takes up more space than most other 12-inch subwoofers

customer_reviews.title: Great Subs, cheap wires
customer_reviews.text: Love the subwoofer and amp! The wiring kit is what brought it down to 4 stars. I took my kit to Custom Audio Concepts (very respected) and the installer (who wasn't just a kid) refused to install the wiring kit in my car. He even said he used to install car audio "in the hood" and would never have installed these. Mentioned that there are tweeter speaker wires that are thicker than these. But overall very pleased with the subwoofer and amp. It shakes my lanyard on my rear view mirror on only half volume!
customer_reviews.author: David Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good value, buy a separate amp wiring kit though
customer_reviews.text: Overall very content. I'm not too bass hungry so I opted for a sealed enclosure instead of ported/vented. I also opted for the Planet Audio amp instead of the MTX brand amp because I heard the MTX amp has issues with overheating. I also didn't want a generic brand amp like BOSS or Crunch, no offense. One thing to note is that the wiring for this kit is GARBAGE. Do not under any circumstances use the amp wiring kit provided in this package. I ordered a separate kit online. The 8 gauge wiring provided is way too thin, I'd go so far as to call it speaker wire.
customer_reviews.author: sanchezm

customer_reviews.title: Yikes
customer_reviews.text: The speakers sound good and work well but.... it took me 3 hours just to figure out how to install some of the wires and after that I had the power wire coming from the battery to the AMP start burning. So I took my car to Best Buy to have them install it and just for new wires it was $100 along with a $200 instillation fee. So in the long run these speakers are gonna be around $400-$500 WITHOUT instillation. Save yourself some trouble go to a local store such as Best Buy and just pick them out and have them install them saves money and hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Aincrad Reborn

customer_reviews.title: Updated! Great bang for buck!
customer_reviews.text: For this price it's hard to find sound like this! They have held up strong for a month now. I've put over 100hours of sound through them. Their still kicking! These are a great combo. Can't beat the price. My personal opinion is that it is nice they give you a wiring kit but it's best to just buy an upgraded wiring. I went with a six gauge wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkley

customer_reviews.title: love it its a great start off package except the ...
customer_reviews.text: love it its a great start off package except the wiring kit its not strong enough but the subs and amp works great doesnt take up space barley got the bass knob at half and it knocks hard.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: MTX subs with planet audio 1500 watt amp
customer_reviews.text: this is the best buy for the price and as a ready to hook up set. I have no complaints about the subs or amp. The only thing that i wish a little bit better was the speaker wire, to me it seemed to thin. So i bought some thicker wire and used that instead. But other than that very happy with it for my first set up. should last along time. Would recommend to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Dean a.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted, and at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These subs were cheap and I was not expecting much, but I am so happy I bought them. They sound great and I have been using them for a couple months now. Only recommendation would be buying larger power and grounding wires. I am using 4 gauge as opposed to the very thin 8 gauge included in the wiring kit. Besides that minor draw back, I am very pleased and would recommend this item to everyone interested in budget-friendly subs.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Great Value version of name brand product.
customer_reviews.text: I'v had a better sounding system. Sound quality I rate 3, bang for your Buck I rate 5. Your not going to find anything cheaper, at this quality. It has a big boom. Not saying its terrible iv just had better.
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: I recommend just getting a new wiring
customer_reviews.text: I got them installed today and damn they bump so loud the only problem is the wiring kit its not a true 8 gag wire so, I recommend just getting a new wiring kit
customer_reviews.author: Darren Mihalic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible buy, status away from these.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas 2018 (less than 4 months ago) and the subwoofers already blew. I had the bass boost all the way down the entire time since day one and I added minor bass with the knob it came with. Truly disappointed with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Maylen Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: An experienced installer recommended to use a 4 gauge wiring kit for this
customer_reviews.text: The amps & subs works great after gettin it professionally installed in 08 Chevy Impala.The wiring kit i was told by the experienced installer is trash & not needed so he used a 4 gauge wiring kit copper for my hook up & it does sound amazing. I did not know the amp came with a subwoofer level knob but that for me wasnt needed but it most definitely was a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality and customer support
customer_reviews.text: The AMP fried in 7 months, and the speakers blew in 13 months. I purchased the extended warranty from Square Trade and they are HORRIBLE!!! DO NOT Purchase extended warranty as they will take 2 weeks to respond, and then tell you to bring your speakers to a local shop to have them repaired and then send your receipt and hope they refund you in amazon gift cards. Terrible terrible service I’m very disappointed

customer_reviews.title: The important thing to know that I would suggest is to upgrade the wiring kit

Does overheat sometimes if you’re really banging for 3+ hours (long road trips) but just turn it down via the bass controll nob for awhile and it’ll be good as new!

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not found here.

And get this theres no return policy. How are we supposed find quality in sound without there being a good wires. So I purchased 300 dollars more of materials including a new Amplifier.

In order to save space I bolted the amp to the top of the speaker box. Wiring was easy, and installation instructions were clear and easy to understand.

product_meta.title: MTX TNE212D 12" 1200W Dual Loaded Car Subwoofers + Box + Planet 1500W Amp + Kit
product_meta.description: This is a complete package! Package includes, MTX loaded car subwoofer system with Mono amplifier and complete amplifier installation kit! The MTX TNE212D combines great subwoofer design with perfect enclosure design to deliver bass that far exceeds expectations. The unit is a dual 12" sealed enclosure that has a single terminal cup showing a final 2O load to any connected amplifier. The Terminator subwoofers used in the enclosure include polypropylene dustcaps that are durable allowing them to survive the rigors of most trunks and are lightweight allowing them to efficiently move using less power. Each subwoofer can handle 200 watts RMS power, resulting in a power level of 400 watts RMS/800 watts Peak for the entire enclosure. The subwoofers also incorporate Spider Plateau Venting, which is a mechanical cooling process that allows the subwoofer to continually refresh the air around the voice coil helping to dissipate the heat generated during extended play. The enclosure itself is made using extra strength 5/8" MDF (medium density fiberboard) which is the preferred material for subwoofer enclosures. Where other manufacturers only use a 1/2" board, the MTX 5/8" board is stronger ensuring that the enclosure can contain the massive low frequency sound waves generated by the subwoofers without problems. Thunder Bass, Hard hitting Dual 12 inch MTX subwoofers Designed For SPL, Rock your car and the neighborhood! Easy Installation, Mounts quickly in most trunks and SUVs We are an authorized MTX dealer!
